Text:
Taken from a TV broadcast and has the "BBC HD" logo onscreen for the duration of the film in the upper left-had corner.  NOT a DVD rip.

The two DVD rips available on TPB have hard-coded Swedish subtitles.

I didn't mind the BBC logo being there. 
A good quality torrent.
A/V 10 Excellent job "Damyan29Damyan29 " Thank you!     - Appreciate  Good Qualities dvd files, very much Enjoyable & Worth Watching.. keep eem coming:-)
